##Git and Github

#####Version control 
*Keep and restoring past versions of files
*Programmers collaborating

#####Files 
*Good for Version Control
*Plain text 
*.R scripts
*markdown (.md/.Rmd)
*html

*Bad for Version Control
*PDFs 
*Videos/pics
*Word docs

Changes to files
